Question: Micro Power Cells, Inc. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Molicel

Product: INR-21700-P50B Ultra-High Power Cell

- Next-generation lithium-ion battery cell
- Highest energy density of 260Wh/kg
- Offers over 400W of power and 5C ultra-fast charging
- Designed for EV Hypercars and EVTOL applications
- Strategic partnership with McMurtry Automotive for performance and sustainability
